notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, I.V.; methodology, I.V. and D.F.; software, D.F.; validation, P.B. and O.C.; formal analysis, D.F. and O.C.; investigation, I.V., D.F., and P.B.; resources, P.B.; data curation, D.F. and R.F.; writing—original draft preparation, I.V.; writing—review and editing, I.V., D.F., and R.F.; supervision, I.V. and D.F.; project administration, I.V.; funding acquisition, I.V.
